TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SecurityKeyUsage extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how a key that is associated with a security token can be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the SecurityKeyUsage enumeration to set <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.KeyUsage%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyUsage Exchange = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the key can be used to exchange keys between a sender and a receiver.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyUsage Signature = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the key can be used to generate a digital signature.
